supportDesc.support: Fragments 1-15 (in mm), (1) 26 x 26, (A) 2 lines, top left margins, (B) 4 lines, right margin, (2) 47 x 35, (A) 2 col., col. i: 5 lines, right margin, col. ii: 5 lines, left margin, (B) 5 lines, no margins, (3) 60 xx 55, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) 7 lines, no margins, (4) 56 x 27, (A) 7 lines, no margins, (B) traces, (5) 43 x 44, (A) 2 lines, bottom margin, (B) traces of 6 lines, (6) 60 x 24, (A) 4 lines, right margin, (B) blank, (7) 43 x 44, (A) 7 lines, left margin, (B) blank, (8) 50 x 35, (A) 5 lines, top margin (?), (B) blank, (9) 48 x 37, (A) 5 lines, no margin, (B) blank, (10) 42 x 36, (A) 6 lines, left margin, (B) 3 lines, top right margins, (11) 105 x 35, (A) 10 lines, bottom margin, (B) blank, (12) 81 x 15, (A) 12 lines, no margins, (B) traces, (13) 69 x 20, (A) 3 lines, top margin, (B) blank, (14) 60 x 44, (A) 3 lines, bottom margin, (B) traces of 4 lines, no margins, (15) 54 x 51, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) blank
